Name.description: The name of the workload identity. The name must be unique within your account.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the workload identity. The name must be unique within your account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9_.-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

AllowedResourceOauth2ReturnUrls.description: The list of allowed OAuth2 return URLs for resources associated with this workload identity.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: \w+:(/?/?)[^\s]+  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedResourceOauth2ReturnUrls.markdownDescription:
